mapper.select:
select p.id, p.title, p.description, p.`status`, p.create_time, p.update_time, p.ban_reason,p.img_list imgStr, u.name username,t.name tabName, (select count(id) from t_comments where post_id = p.id) commentNum, (select count(id) from t_post_likes where post_id = p.id) likeNum, (select count(id) from t_post_favorites where post_id = p.id) favoriteNum from t_post p join t_user u on p.user_id = u.id join t_tab t on p.tab_id = t.id
and p.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and u.name like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and t.name = #{tabName}
and p.description like concat('%',#{description},'%')
order by p.create_time desc
